subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “Multitudinous; vast; ocean”:
: {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} compares it with {{cog|bo|ཡངས་པ||wide; extensive; vast; spacious}}. In contrast, {{zh-ref|Starostin}} sets up {{cog|sit-pro||*lɨ̆ŋ|wave}}, encompassing this and {{cog|bo|ཀློང||space; expanse; wave}}, {{cog|my|လှိုင်း||wave; to abound; plentiful}}.
: Compare {{och-l|羕|(''of rivers'') long}}, {{och-l|漾|waves; (''of rivers'') long}}.

Etymology 1
Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|洋の東%西を問わず|よう の とう%ざい を とわず}}: “regardless of east or west of the [[ocean]]” → in either the East or the West → anywhere in the [[world]], all over the world

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なだ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なだ|-}}.  Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 {{CE}}.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|17|3893}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man17Yo.html#3893 here]</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|ひろし}}

[[nominalization|Nominalization]] of the {{m|ja|終止形||tr=shūshikei|terminal form}} of classical [[adjective]] {{m|ja|広し|tr=hiroshi}}, modern {{m|ja|広い|tr=hiroi||[[vast]], [[wide]]}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|서양}} (西洋) [[the West]] (Europe, America)
* {{l|ko|동양}} (東洋) [[the East]], [[the Orient]] (Asia)
* {{l|ko|양식}} (洋式) [[western]] [[style]]
* {{l|ko|양식}} (洋食) [[western]] [[food]]
* {{l|ko|태평양}} (太平洋) [[the Pacific]]
* {{l|ko|대서양}} (大西洋) [[the Atlantic]]
* {{l|ko|인도양}} (印度洋) [[the Indian Ocean]]
* {{l|ko|해양}} (海洋) [[ocean]], [[sea]]
* {{l|ko|양말}} (洋襪) [[socks]]
* {{l|ko|양복}} (洋服) [[suit]]
* {{l|ko|원양}} (遠洋) far [[sea]], deep [[sea]]
